O praise<S>1984</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, all ye nations<S>1471</S>: praise<S>7623</S> him, all ye people<S>523</S>.
For his merciful<S>2617</S> kindness<S>2617</S> is great<S>1396</S> toward us: and the truth<S>571</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>.
